member.name: T:Goedel.Discovery.ClientUDP
member.summary: UDP Client wrapper. Performs buffering on reads.

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.ClientUDP.#ctor(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: Optional timeout value, if zero reads will not timeout.
Maximum number of data values to accept

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBuffer.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create buffer with specified initial and maximum size.

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBuffer.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Create buffer from received data buffer and length specification.

member.name: T:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex
member.summary: Buffer class for DNS operations using a portion of a buffer specified by a separate index. This buffer class is used to read in records etc. whose length is specified by an external range with proper buffer overrun checks.

member.name: P:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.Bytes
member.summary: Return the buffer data window as a byte array.

member.name: F:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.MaxRead
member.summary: Maximum number of bytes to be buffered.

member.name: P:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.Start
member.summary: Mark and return the current position.

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.Remainder(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the space remaining in a buffer of Length bytes begun from the point last marked with Start.

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.WriteString(System.String)
member.summary: Write string value with no length prefix (length specified otherwise)

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.WriteString8(System.String)
member.summary: Write string value with 8 bit length prefix

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.WriteL8Data(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Write data value with byte length prefix value

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.WriteL16Data(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Write value with 2 byte length prefix.

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.WriteData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Write value with no length prefix

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.ReadL8Data
member.summary: Read string value with 8 bit length prefix

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.ReadL16Data
member.summary: Read string value with 16 bit length prefix

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.ReadL16Data(Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex@)
member.summary: Read data value with 16 bit length delimeter.

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.ReadData
member.summary: Read binary data value (remainder of the buffer)

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.ReadData(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read remainder of the buffer as binary data value

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.ReadString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read string value with specified length.

member.name: M:Goedel.Discovery.DNSBufferIndex.ReadStrings(System.Int32)
member.returns: Null list, this is a stub
